}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== From a dissected unit... *P/N: 143046-400 REV: 01" and "MADE IN TAIWAN R.O.C." is silkscreened on the board. **A sticker with "143046-001 5 BB" is affixed underneath the silkscreened text. *The MAC used is an '''[[ADMtek]]''' AN986 ('''[[Pegasus]]''') marked with '''0032VCAER1326810.01'''. *The PHY used is an '''[[Altima]]''' AC101-TF. *also in use... **a '''[[Winbond]]''' W24L257AJ-12 32KB (32Kb x 8) High Speed CMOS Static RAM chip **an '''ATC''' 93LC46 Serial EEPROM *The Ethernet connector is '''Amphenol''' branded.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
